title: Knowledge, attitude, and practices of restaurant and foodservice personnel in food allergy. A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Ximena A. Figueroa-Gómez, María Jesús Oliveras-López, Marcelo F. Poyanco-Bugueño, Francisco M. Ocaña-Peinado, Herminia López-García de la Serrana, Magdalena Araya Quezada
